name: Reddit Black Theme [V1.0.2]
description: A Black Theme for Reddit. To use this style correctly, enable Reddit's own dark theme! This style currently only supports the redesign of Reddit, but old Reddit support will come later.

user.name: Lekrkoekj
user.about:
Hi I'm Lekrkoekj! 
I mostly make Dark Themes for a lot of sites on here. If you like any of my styles,  be sure to give feedback on them.

additional_info:
Version 1.0.2
The Sign In and Sign Up screens are now black.

Version 1.0.1
The background when viewing a post fullscreen is now black.
Reddit Chat is now dark.

Version 1.0
Initial release.
